summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 2, 2019. It includes official inmate counts, out-count forms, and assignment rosters, notably listing Jeffrey Epstein as an inmate assigned to an attorney visit.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine inmate counts, out-counts, and work/assignment rosters were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as inmate #76318-054 on an attorney visit assignment roster dated August 2, 2019.
The documents show routine prison operations including inmate counts, housing unit censuses, and assignment rosters for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Several inmates, including 'Bang', 'Duncan', 'Weber', and 'Tisdale', are noted as being on 'suicide watch' or 'suicide or' status.
The total inmate population count fluctuates between 756 and 761 across different count sheets on the same day.
The documents are administrative prison records showing Epstein's status as an inmate shortly before his death.
